summarized_judgment: supreme court of india national engineering industries vs rajasthan and ors on 1 december, 1999 of the learned single judge. the ruling dated march 25, 1996 of the division bench of the rajasthan high court affirming in appeal the judgment dated december 15, 1992. by this judgment the learned judge negatived the challenge of the appellant to validity of the ruling.

tagline: Gram Panchayat Kakran vs Addl. Director Of Consolidation & ... on 3 October, 1997
summarized_judgment: the appellant is gram panchayat of village kakran. in consolidation proceedings which took place in 1956 under east punjab holdings ( consolidation ) act 1948, the net entitlement of sangha singh, father of the 2nd respondent was held to be of the value of 152 - 15 - 9 pai.

tagline: State Of Kerala vs Surface Coats, Neelimangalam on 6 December, 1995
summarized_judgment: the appeals were preferred against the judgment of a division bench of the kerala high court allowing the appeals preferred by the respondent and deleting the penalty levied upon it. in the return, the. respondent produced a certificate issued by the district industries center dated 27 - 10 - 1986 granting sales tax exemption for the said three years.

tagline: Ashok Paper Mills Kamgar Union vs Union Of India (Uoi) And Ors. on 26 April, 1999
summarized_judgment: the scheme of rehabilitation of ashok paper mills in darbhanga, the state of bihar was finalised after prolonged negotiations by order dated july 6, 1996. more than two and a half years have elapsed, yet the implementation has not been possible for one reason or the other. the state had taken responsibility of providing uninterrupted power.

tagline: Fertilizer Corporation Ofindia ... vs Sarat Chandra Rath And Ors on 23 August, 1996
summarized_judgment: supreme court of india fertilizer corporation ofindia.. vs sarat chandra rath and ors on 23 august, 1996 equivalent citations. the respondents 1 to 23, prior to 1st january 1987, were employed as workmen by the appellants. a direction was issued for re - fixation of the pay in manner indicated by the high court.

tagline: Gurmesh Prakash Bishnoi vs State Of Haryana And Ors on 5 May, 1998
summarized_judgment: the appellant was appointed as member of the haryana public service commission with effect from 4. 3. so. he continued as a member of haryana public services commission for a period of six years up to 27. s. 90. appellant contends that in addition, he is entitled to pension for his services as chairman.

tagline: Indian Council For ... vs Union Of India (Uoi) And Ors. on 18 April, 1996
summarized_judgment: a notification dated 19. 2. 1991 declaring coastal stretches as coastal regulation zones ( hereinafter referred to as'the regulation zones which regulates the activities in the said zones has not been implemented or enforced. india has a coast line running into 6000 k. ms. which has abundance of natural endowments, geographic attractions and natural beauty.

tagline: Kalidas Umedram And Ors vs State Of Gujarat And Anr on 13 December, 1995
summarized_judgment: kalidas umedram and ors vs state of gujarat and anr were granted 2 acres 9 guntas of land in 1976 for agricultural purposes. but they entered into an agreement to sell the land admeasuring 3000 sq. yards to different person. but when the appellants had filed the proceedings before the authorities challenged the validity of the application.

tagline: State Of Rajasthan vs Sanjay Kumar & Ors on 1 May, 1998
summarized_judgment: supreme court of india state of rajasthan vs. sanjay kumar & ors on 1 may, 1998. in his report of july 2, 1988, the senior drugs inspector ( i. b. ) collected samples of ( i ) tenokap suspension b. no. 303 and ( ii ) tab. oxyphenbutabne i. p. b was also banned under section 468 ( 2 ) crl. misc. petition no. 293 dated april 11, 1996.

tagline: Malwa Vanaspati & Chemical Co. vs Commissioner Of Income Tax on 1 October, 1996
summarized_judgment: appeals relate to the assessment years 1971 - 72, 1972 - 73 and 1973 - 74. in its income - tax returns for these assessment years, the assessee claimed as deduction of expenditure for the purpose of business under section 37 of the income tax act, 1961. the penalty levied under sections 8 ( 2 ) and 17 ( 3 ) of the madhya pradesh general sales tax act. the commissioner may direct him to pay a sum not exceeding one - fourth of the tax.
